CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Compact Easter Egg Selector
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Whether you want a selector that is compact, or has more info

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: ~Nyan Nyan Nyan~
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables the Nyan Cat Song (You know you want to hear it ;D)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: New Treats for Neko
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Switches the treats from donuts for cookies for the nekos :D (Requires Restart)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Launch actual Android N Easter Egg
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Launches the actual Easter Egg for Android N as if you have tapped the version number on an Android N device (Android 7 & 8 only)

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Access Partial Egg
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Checking this option will allow you to access the Easter Eggs up till the point where you need a later version of Android to access

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use Current Device's Build Number
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Whether the easter eggs should use your phone's Build object or hardcoded values that fits the easter egg selected

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Test Upcoming Eggs
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables some upcoming eggs for testing purposes (Note: These eggs are still in development)
